title: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts: Donate
body: Donate       Thank you for your interest in supporting Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts. The park may accept donations from individuals, families, organizations, foundations, corporations, businesses, associations and other entities. Your contribution will be used to support the National Park Service programs of the only park in the country dedicated to the performing arts. The park is able to accept direct donations. If you are interested in donating, you may contact the park by phone at (703) 255-1808, contact us by e-mail, or at the address below. Please make checks out to the National Park Service. Donations may be mailed to: Director Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts 1551 Trap Rd. Vienna, VA 22182 Thank you for your support of Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts.
